sense.name: A flow of fluid.
sense.examples: He felt a stream of urine flow against his will. The hose ejected a stream of water. Walk down to the stream and gather some water.

sense.name: The dominant course of events or ideas.
sense.examples: Two steams of development run through American history. The poem was a stream of consciousness.

sense.name: The act of flowing or streaming as if one were water.
sense.examples: A steam of people emptied from the terminal. The children made a stream through the museum. The theater planned carefully for the continuous stream of visitors.
